reviews.review: full of hackers and toxic chinese idiots

wanna play against 1-2 years accounts in the 2 highest ranks even tho you have 5k+ hours, prime enabled, over 1500 MM wins and a account from january 2005? then you're at the right place - enjoy the hackfest ;)

Seriously , the word hacker had already planted into every csgo player's mind.
So everytime we saw someone is pro then hes absoulotely no doubt that is the hacker .
Weither he is hacker or not , i think that gaben should fix VAC for better experience.
